subject: Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor
description_text:
Hey guys,

I'm located in Ireland and I'm looking to buy the "Simsonn VAM Pro Linear
Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback".

My question is, does it come with a UK plug if I ship to Ireland? Only UK
plugs are used here

conversations.body_text: Hi Kon Le,    We will provide the appropriate power plug according to your country. You can also specify the plug type in the order notes.

Awesome, thanks for the info!

On Sat 22 Nov 2025 at 02:53, service@simsonn.com

Hey guys,

I am writing regarding the Order #SSN3864

Can you guys make sure that the power plug is UK type, and that the U
shaped mounting bracket is for the brake?

On Sat, Nov 22, 2025 at 2:53 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Kon Le,      This is terrible. For Ireland, we provided the EU standard. However, the U-shaped mounting bracket is correct.

Guys I even wrote you an email regarding it, asking you if you will send me
uk plug if you ship to ireland. Can you send me uk plug? Uk plug is
standard in ireland, there is no eu plug in ireland anywhere.

On Thu 27 Nov 2025 at 11:09, service@simsonn.com
sorry, we will take note of this.

Will you send me a uk plug please?

On Thu 27 Nov 2025 at 11:38, service@simsonn.com
Can you please? As you said you will send correct one before

So can I expect you to send me a UK plug? I have no need for a EU one, I
can’t use it…

Guys, I paid 75 euros to get it here and you won’t even send me the correct
plug?

On Thu 27 Nov 2025 at 11:38, service@simsonn.com

You will send me UK plug right?

On Thu 27 Nov 2025 at 11:38, service@simsonn.com

Hi Kon Le,    We apologize for the delayed response. But since the plug is a complimentary gift, we are unable to resend it. However, you may pay a $9 shipping fee, and we will send you a replacement. Thank you for your understanding.

Can you send me a picture of how the plug is supposed to look? Both the eu
and the uk version?

I’ll then decide if I can buy it here or from you
Hi Kon Le,    We are currently unable to provide photos, but the UK version is correct, as we have a large number of UK customers, please don't worry.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-1

Hey,

Could I maybe better get a free shipping on my next order?

Can you please check where is my order? It’s taking incredibly long to
deliver and it seems like it’s stuck in the netherlands for a long time
Hi Kon Le,    I apologize for the delayed response. I see your package has been delivered—have you received it?
